item.description: Please bring micro-spikes and snow shoes may be needed too. This hike is only about 1 1/2 hours with no snow on the ground but may take a bit longer with snow and ice.
item.why: Anyone who is free tomorrow afternoon that would like to get out for a 4 mile hike to Doane's Falls and around Tully Lake is welcome to join me. Sounds like a nice day in the 40's. We can hike longer if anyone is up for it. Plenty of trails.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Tully Lake and Doane's Falls Hike
